Verses: 1 irandaam Seettu Simiyonukku Vizhundhadhu; Simiyon Puththirarin Koththiraththirku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharam, Yoodhaa Puththirarudaiya Sudhandharaththin Naduve Irukkiradhu.
2 peyersepaa, Sepaa, Molaadhaa,
3 aasaar Sookaal, Paalaa, Aadhsem,
4 eldholaadh, Peththool, Ormaa,
5 siklaak, Pedhmaarkaapodh, Aadhsaar Soosaa,
6 pedhlepaavodh, Sarugen Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalum Utpada Padhinmoondru.
7 melum Aayin, Rimmon, Ethther, Aasaan Ennum Naalu Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalume.

8 indhap Pattanangalai Sutrilum Paalaadhpeyermattum, Therkeyirukkira Raamaadhmattum Irukkira Ellaa Graamangalume; Ivai Simiyon Puththirarudaiya Koththiraththirku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharam.

9 simiyon Puththirarudaiya Sudhandharam Yoodhaa Puththirarin Panguveedhaththirkul Irukkiradhu; Yoodhaa Puththirarin Pangu Avargalukku Michchamaayirundhapadiyaal, Simiyon Puththirar Avargal Sudhandharaththin Naduvile Sudhandharam Petraargal.
10 moondraam Seettu Sepulon Puththirarukku Vizhundhadhu; Avargalukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharapanguveedham Saareedhmattumulladhu.
11 avargaludaiya Ellai Merke Maaraalaavukku Eri, Thaapaseththukku Vandhu, Yokkineyaamukku Edhiraana Aatrukkup Pom.
12 saareedhilirundhu Adhu Kizhakke Sooriyan Udhikkum Munaiyaaik Kisloththaaporin Ellaiyinidaththukkuth Thirumbi, Thaaparaaththukku Sendru, Yappiyaavukku Eri,
13 angeyirundhu Kizhakkuppuraththile Kiththaaeperaiyum Iththaagaadhseenaiyum Kadandhu, Rimmonmeththovaarukkum Neyaavukkum Pom.
14 appuram Andha Ellai Vadakke Annaththonukkuth Thirumbi, Ipdhaavelin Pallaththaakkile Mudiyum.
15 kaaththaadh, Nagalaal, Simron, Idhaalaa, Pedhlakem Mudhalaana Pannirandu Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalum,
16 sepulon Puththirarukku, Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharam.
17 naalaam Seettu Isakkaarukku Vizhundhadhu.
18 isakkaar Puththirarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Ellai, Yesrayel, Kesullodh, Soonem,
19 appiraayeem, Seegon, Anaagaraadh,
20 raappidh, Kishiyon, Apedhs,
21 remedh, Enkanneem, Enkaadhaa, Pedhpaadhses Ivaigale.
22 appuram Andha Ellai Thaaporukkum, Sagaseemaavukkum, Pedhshimesukkum Vandhu Yordhaanile Mudiyum; Adharkul Padhinaaru Pattanangalum Avaigaludaiya Graamangalumundu.
23 indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalai Serndha Graamangalum Isakkaar Puththirarin Koththiraththirku, Avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharam.
24 aindhaam Seettu Aaser Puththirarudaiya Koththiraththukku Vizhundhadhu.
25 avargaludaiya Vamsangalinpadi Avargalukkuk Kidaiththa Ellai, Elkaadh, Aali, Pedhen, Aksaap,
26 alammelek, Aamaadh, Mishayaal Ivaigale; Pinbu Adhu Merke Karmelukkum Seekorlipnaaththirkum Sendru,
27 kizhakke Peththaakonukkuth Thirumbi, Sepulonukku Vadakkeyirukkira Ipdhaavelin Pallaththaakkukkum Peththemekkukkum Nekiyelukkum Vandhu, Idadhupuramaana Kaapoolukkum,
28 ebironukkum, Rekobukkum, Ammonukkum, Kaanaavukkum, Periya Seedhonmattum Pom.
29 appuram Andha Ellai Raamaavukkum Theeru Ennum Aranippaana Pattanammattum Thirumbum; Pinbu Andha Ellai Osaavukkuth Thirumbi, Akseepin Ellai Oraththilulla Samuththiraththile Mudiyum.
30 ummaavum, Aappekkum, Rekobum Adharku Aduththirukkiradhu; Indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalin Graamangalum Irubaththirandu.
31 indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalin Graamangalum Aaser Puththirarin Koththiraththukku, Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharam.
32 aaraam Seettu Napthali Puththirarukku Vizhundhadhu.
33 napthali Puththirarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa, Ellai Eleppilum, Saanaanimilulla Allonilumirundhu Vandhu Aadhami, Nekkepinmelum Yaapniyelinmelum, Lakkoommattum Poi, Yordhaanil Mudiyum.
34 appuram Andha Ellai Merke Asnoththaaporukkuth Thirumbi, Angeyirundhu Ukkorukku Sendru Therke Sepulonaiyum, Merke Aaseraiyum Sooriyodhayappuraththile Yordhaanile Yoodhaavaiyum Serndhu Varum.
35 aranippaana Pattanangalaavana; Seeththim, Ser, Ammaadh, Rakkaadh, Kinnaredh,
36 aadhamaa, Raamaa, Aadhsor,
37 kedhes, Edhreyi, Enaadhsor.
38 eeron, Mikdhaalel Orem, Pedhaanaadh, Pedhshimes Mudhalaanavaigale; Pattanangalum Avaigalin Graamangalumutpada Paththonbadhu.
39 indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalin Graamangalum Napthali Puththirarudaiya Koththiraththukku, Avargal Vamsangalinpadi, Undaana Sudhandharam.
40 ezhaam Seettu Thaan Puththirarudaiya Koththiraththirku Vizhundhadhu.
41 avargalukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Kidaiththa Sudhandharaththin Ellaiyaavadhu, Soraa, Esdhaavol, Irsemes,
42 saalaapeen, Aayalon, Pedhlaa,
43 elon, Thimnaadhaa, Ekron,
44 eldhekke, Kipeththon, Paalaadh,
45 yekoodh, Penaperaak, Kaadhrimmon,
46 meyaarkon, Raakkon Ennum Pattanangalum, Yaappovukku Edhiraana Ellaiyume.

47 thaan Puththirarin Ellai Avargalukku Odukkamaayirundhapadiyaal, Avargal Purappattuppoi, Leseminmel Yuththampanni, Adhaip Pidiththu, Pattayakkarukkinaal Sangariththu, Adhai Sudhandhariththukkondu, Adhile Kudiyirundhu, Lesemukkuth Thangal Thagappanaagiya Thaanudaiya Naamaththinpadiye Thaan Endru Perittaargal.
48 indhap Pattanangalum Ivaigalin Graamangalum Thaan Puththirarin Koththiraththirku Avargal Vamsangalinpadi Undaana Sudhandharam.
49 dhesaththai Adhin Ellaigalinpadi Sudhandharamaagap Pangittuth Theerndhapodhu, Isravel Puththirar Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavukkuth Thangal Naduvile Oru Sudhandharaththaik Koduththaargal.

50 eppiraayeemin Malaiththesaththilirukkira Thimnaadhseraa Ennum Avan Ketta Pattanaththai Avanukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadiye Koduththaargal; Andhap Pattanaththai Avan Katti, Adhile Kudiyirundhaan.

51 aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavum, Koththirappidhaakkaludaiya Thalaivarum Seelovile Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Vaasalilekarththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Isravel Puththirarin Koththirangalukku Seettuppottuk Koduththa Sudhandharangal Ivaigale; Ivvidhamaai Avargal Dhesaththaip Pangittu Mudiththaargal.
